alert.note: Alert for Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 29 at 3:26PM EDT until October 02 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Albany NY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Connecticut... Housatonic River At Gaylordsville affecting Litchfield County. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River at Gaylordsville. * WHEN...From late tonight to Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.5 feet, The water reaches businesses on the low side of Spring Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 PM EDT Friday the stage was 6.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 8.9 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Gaylordsville Flood Stage: 8.0 Observed Stage at Fri 3 pm: 6.6 Forecast: Fri 8 pm 7.2 Sat 2 am 8.0 Sat 8 am 8.5 Sat 2 pm 8.8 Sat 8 pm 8.9 Sun 2 am 8.8 Sun 8 am 8.7 Sun 2 pm 8.5 Sun 8 pm 8.3 Mon 2 am 8.0 Mon 8 am 7.7 &&
